00001 def evensample(pop, rand, size):
00002     newpop = pop[:]
00003     newpop.sort(key=lambda x:x.fitness)
00004     subset = []
00005 
00006     popsize = len(pop)
00007     step = popsize/size
00008     i = 0
00009     while i < popsize and len(subset) < size:
00010         subset.append(newpop[i])
00011         i += step
00012 
00013     newindex = []
00014     for ind in subset:
00015         newindex.append(pop.index(ind))
00016 
00017     return subset, newindex
00018
